p: The essential oil of Z. gilletti leaves showed larvicidal activity against Anopheles gambiae, the mosquito vector of malaria in Africa [ 12]. It has also been found that the essential oil Z. alatum exhibits antifungal and antibacterial activity [ 13], and the essential oil of Z. simulans exhibits anthelmintic activity [ 14]. The methanolic extract and the essential oil from fruits of Zanthoxylum zanthoxyloides and Zanthoxylum leprieurii presented anti-cancer and anti-microbial properties in vitro assays [ 15].
